# Clustering with *k*-means

## Goals for Today {-} 

* Introduce and talk about unsupervised learning methods
* Talk about clustering and go over *k*-means clustering approaches/visualizations. 

## Readings for Today {-} 

### Required {-}

* Mishra, [Unsupervised Learning and Data Clustering](https://towardsdatascience.com/unsupervised-learning-and-data-clustering-eeecb78b422a)
* GeeksForgeeks.org, [K-Means Clustering in R Programming
](https://www.geeksforgeeks.org/k-means-clustering-in-r-programming/#:~:text=K%20Means%20Clustering%20in%20R,a%20segment%20called%20a%20cluster.)
* Shraddha Shukla and Naganna S., [A Review On K-means Data Clustering Approach](https://www.ripublication.com/irph/ijict_spl/ijictv4n17spl_15.pdf), *International Journal of Information & Computation Technology*. Volume 4, Number 17 (2014), pp. 1847-1860
